'''1.21.72''' is a hotfix for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on April 8, 2025, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/35674713271949-Minecraft-1-21-72-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.72 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=April 8, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.72|otherissuescount=2
|MCPE-194959|Sea Pickles no longer replace blocks when being placed on a partial block <!-- link in changelog doesn't work -->
|MCPE-194195|Text in renamed book and quill is not saved when closing the book and quill
}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay
* Fixed some cases of players' locations being massively rewound during long server stalls
